com.here.android.mpa.search

Class RequestCreator.Geocoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.search.RequestCreator.Geocoder
  • Enclosing class:
    RequestCreator

    public static final class RequestCreator.Geocoder
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a factory service used to instantiate geocoder requests.

    A Geocoder enables searching for Location data by way of the following search services:

    • Structured Address Geocode - matches an Address to its correct Location on the map (its latitude and longitude).
    • Reverse Geocode - retrieves an Address based on a given GeoCoordinate.

    Note: Geocoder objects can create either a GeocodeRequest or a ReverseGeocodeRequest that applications use to request an appropriate search result.

      • createOneBoxRequest

        public static GeocodeRequest createOneBoxRequest(GeoCoordinate location,
                                 java.lang.String query)
                                          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a geocoder request that resolves a free text query into a Location.
        Parameters:
        location - A GeoCoordinate representing the search location context. The one-box request will resolve the query text to Locations centered around this coordinate.
        query - Query text specifying the address to locate
        Returns:
        The GeocodeRequest
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Upon a failure to handle a passed argument
